author: sbein
body:
This replacement in data/cmsswdata.txt in CMSSW_15_0_X/master for PhysicsTools-NanoAOD 

V01-06-00  V01-07-00.

is needed in order for teh NANOv15 NANO refinement to work as backported in CMSSW_15_0, e.g., https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/50209, along with the ONNX-encoded torch model: https://github.com/cms-data/PhysicsTools-NanoAOD/pull/20.
title: Bump PhysicsTools-NanoAOD data to V01-07-00 for CMSSW_15_0_X IB
